    Player(String name, double balance, int numOfWins)

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, double balance, int numOfWins)
      This Constructor initiates the ArrayList and constructs the player with the name balance and number of wins It also initiates an empty hand without any cards
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player
      balance - The current Balance of the player
      numOfWins - The number of wins the player has

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Player otherPlayer)
      Compare the player to another player by the number of wins they have and places the person with a more wins first when sorted
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Player>
      Parameters:
      otherPlayer - The player that is being compared to
      Returns:
      A positive integer if the player has more wins, negative if less, 0 if the same amount of wins
